column2: Coronavirus Youraya Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mana muAfrica
column3: Zimbabwe nhasi yapinda muzuva rechipfumbamwe vanhu vachikurudzirwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitatu pasi rose. MuZimbabwe mune vanhu gumi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye mumwe chete akafa.Vachitaura neStudio 7, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi vati vari kutyira zvikuru kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezvitatu vakabva kuSouth Africa painge ponzi vanhu munyika iyi vagare mudzimba vanogona kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vachabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere hunogona kunge wakaderera nekuti varikuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti muAfrica mafa vanhu vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mana uye vakawanda vacho vari muSouth Africa umo mafawo vanhu gumi nemumwe chete kusvika parizvino. Dunhu reSADC rine vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Asi kunyika dzekumawirira ndiko kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwaJohns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. America iyo ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vafa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi kunyangwe vakawanda vafa pasi rose vachiri vekuItaly kwashaya vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu. Mutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson avo vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vaendeswa kunorapwa vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit mushure mekusimbirwa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi. Kunyangwe zviri pachena kuti kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba kunobatsira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanofa nechirwere ichi, vamwe muZimbabwe vave kugunun’una kuti vave kufa nenzara sezvo vemabhizimisi vakawedzera mitengo yezvekudya zvakanyanya.

column2: Mutambo wakandikoshera, anodaro Sikandar Raza
column3: CHIKWATA checricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mu”hondo” svondo rino apo chichatatsurana nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International series (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeT20 International.   Mitambo iyi ndeyekutanga yeSuper League iro richangoparurwa uye yekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi e2023 International Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup achaitirwa kuIndia.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kunyika yePakistan anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru mutambo uyu uye sechikwata vanoda kukunda sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mumakwikwi ekupedzisira eWorld Cup ayo akaitwa mugore ra2019, maChevrons akakundikana kuenda kunokwikwidza kuEngland neWales mushure mekunge akundwa mumitambo yekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Toda kushanda nesimba kuti tiende kuWorld Cup.   Chishuvo chedu kuti tihwine mitambo yeSuper League tibve taenda kuWorld Cup. Hatisi kuda zvekuzotamba mimwe mitambo nekuti paWorld Cup yekupedzisira takatadziswa kuenda nemaruns maviri chaiwo. Saka zvinhu zvakatirwadza kutadza kuenda kumitambo iyi apa isu taitamba cricket yepamusoro-soro,” anodaro Raza   Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kuPakistan asi akazokurira muZimbabwe, anoti mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi unoreva zvakawanda kwaari sezvo uchange uri wenyika mbiri dziri pamwoyo wake.   “Ndinoyemura zvikuru nzvimbo ino. Ndiri chizvarwa chekuPakistan asi ndichitambira Zimbabwe saka zvinhu zvinondifadza kudzoka kumusha kuzotamba mutambo uyu.   “Chinhu chakanyanyonakisa ndechekuti nyika mbiri idzi, Pakistan neZimbabwe, dzose dzakanditambira zvandiri,” anodaro Raza.   Mutambo wekutanga wePakistan nemaChevrons uriko nemusi weChishanu chino uye wechipiri uchizotambwa musi wa1 Mbudzi kozoti wechitatu musi wa3 Mbudzi.   Mitambo iyi ichange iri yeODI uye ichingopera chete mitambo yeT20 yobva yatanga musi wa7, 8 na10 Mbudzi.   Mitambo yeSuper League ichange iine nyika 13 dzichibandana kurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup. Zvikwata zvinomwe zvichapedza zviri pamusoro pamwe chete neIndia zvinobva zvatowaniswa tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Zvimwe zvishanu zvacho zvinenge zvasara zvichazotatsurana mumutambo uchazorongwa pachitsvagwa zvikwata zviviri izvo zvinozotevera zvimwe zvisere zvagara zvinenge zvatobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup.

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Major General Mugoba Vachivaviga kuHeroes Acre
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaviga gamba renyika, Major General Trust Mugoba, vachiti kushaya kwavo, pamwe nekushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwasiya nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaVaMugoba, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yakarasikirwa zvikuru svondo rapfuura apo pakashaya VaMugabe naVaMugoba musi mumwe chete. Vati ndufu dzemagamba maviri aya dzinoita kuti veruzhinji varangarire hondo yerusununguko. Vati VaMugoba munhu akakura muchiuto kubvira panguva yehondo uyewo zvichitevera rusununguko muna 1980, vakati izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti varadzikwe paHeroes Acre. VaMnangagwa vati VaMugoba, avo vashaya vaine chigaro chepamusoro muchiuto kuAfrican Union kuEthopia, munhu aiziva kukosha kwerunyararo muAfrica uye zvakakosha kuti runyararo urwu ruchengetedzwe. Vatendawo mauto nekuchentegedza runyararo munyika vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiita zvavanoda kukanganisa runyararo nerusununguko hwakaunzwa nevanhu vakaita semushakabvu. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandisa pane avo vanoda kukanganisa ruranyararo munyika. Vati vanoziva kutambura kuri munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pamwe nezvirongwa zvekuvandudza uye vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa izvi. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reSeneti, Retired Major General Mike Nyambuya, avo vakashanda nemushakabvu vati VaMugoba munhu aiziva nekuita basa rake nemazvo. VaMugoba vakashaya vave nechinzvimbo chepamusoro mumauto eAfrica National Union kuEthopia. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. No media source currently available

column2: VaBiti Voshanyira Dr Patson Dzamara neVamwe Vari muHusungwa
column3: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti nhasi vaenda kuHarare Central Prison nekuChikurubi uko kune nhengo gumi neimwe dzakasungwa dzichiratidzira muAfrica Unity Square. Vakasungwa ava vanosanganisa Muzvare Linda Masarira, Tatenda Mombeyarara, Dr Patson Dzamara, Pride Mukono, Muzvare Pamela Mawire, Makomborero Haruzivishe, Muzvare Irene Takavada, Shadreck Dhliwayo naBrian Kansunzuma. Vechidiki ava vaida kuratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutonga nedemo. Kudare ramajastiriti vakanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inosvika chiuru chemadhora inonzi nemagweta yakawandisa. No media source currently available VaBiti vati vanhu vari muhusungwa ava vari kunetseka zvikuru nekuti hapana vari kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora zvemari yechibatiso. Madzimai ari kuChikurubi anonzi ari kunetsekawo nekushaya zvokudya uye mvura yakachena. Mumwe mudzimai ane mwana ane mwedzi mitatu anonzi akatomurumura nekuda kwekusungwa uku.

column2: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
column3: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

column2: Zvicherwa neSarudzo Zvinokurukurwa muWashington paHurukuro dzeGlobal Press Institute
column3: Sangano reGlobal Press nemusi weChina muWashington D.C., rakakokera hurukuro dzakanangana neZimbabwe munyaya dzekucherwa zviri kunze kwemutemo kwezviwanikwa nemakorokoza, pamwe nesarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rino. Hurukuro idzi, idzo dzaive pasi pechirongwa cheGlobal Press Influencer Series, dzakaitirwa paNewseum, pasi pedingindira rekuti “Zimbabweans Take Action”, kana kuti “Vana veZimbabwe Torai Matanho”, uye dzaitsigirwa nemasangano anosanganisira reNewseum Institute, neMetropolitan Group. Vakataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy Inc., VaCharles Mutama, Muzvare Wadzanayi Mhute veNew York Times, Muzvare Linda Mujuru veGlobal Press Journal, naMuzvare Cristina Maria Villegas, vanove mukuru anoona nezvezvicherwa musangano rakazvimirira rePACT. Muzvare Villegas vakati munyika dzese dzavakafamba pasi rose, Zimbabwe ndiyo ine zvicherwa zvakawanda asi zvisina anochengetedza nenzira dzingaite kuti zvibatsire veruzhinji. Panyaya yesarudzo, vatauri vose ava vakawirirana kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanogona kukunda musarudzo idzi, vachiti dzichabiridzirwa pachishandiswa mauto. Vatauri ava vakatiwo kunyangwe mapato anopikisa akakunda, havaoni achipiwa mukana wekutonga. Muzvare Mujuru vakati vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vachakunda musarudzo, sezvo pasina vanopikisa vakasimba, uye pachiratidza sepasina gwara chairo mumapato anopikisa. No media source currently available

column2: Vanotakura Zvinhu Zvinopfuura nePamuganhu weNyika Voshora Mitemo Mitsva yeZimra
column3: Vatyairi vemotokari dzinofamba neveruzhinji vachienda kunze kwenyika vanoti mutemo wakaiswa nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, wekuti vazivise hurumende mazita evanhu nezvinhu zvavanenge vakatakura maawa matatu vasati vasvika pamuganhu wenyika wakaitwa zvechimbichimbi veruzhinji vasina kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzawo. Izvi zvinotevera chiziviso chakaitwa neZimra ichiti iri kutora danho iri senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko rekunonoka kubatsira vanhu vanenge vachida kupinda munyika pamwe nekuti nyika ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero yainenge ichitora kuvanhu nemakambani. Zimra inoti munhu anotadza kutevedza mutemo uyu anosungwa achibhadhariswa faindi. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors, VaFradreck Maguramhinga, vanoti pabepa mutemo uyu unoratidza kuve wakanaka asi nguva zhinji mitemo iyi haitevedzerwi nehurumende. VaMaguramhinga vanotiwo zvakakoshawo kuti dai vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vachipihwa mukana wekuisawo pfungwa dzavo panenge pachiiswa mitemo mitsva inovabata. VaMaguramhinga vanoti zvinganetsa pamutemo uyu inyaya yekuti vatyairi vanenge voda kuti vashandise michina inoratidza zvinenge zviri mumabhegi evafambi sezvo vachikwanisa kunyeberwa zvinenge zvakatakurwa nemunhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti kuti mutemo uyu ushande zvakanaka, panoda kunyatsotsanangurwa nzira dzekuti mazita evanhu nezvakatakurwa izvi zvinosvitswa sei kuZimra. Asi imwewo nyanzvi inoongorora zveupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti havaoni mutemo uyu uchibudirira nekuti Zimra haisati yavanemishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti zvairi kuda zvive nyore. Hurongwa hweZimra huri kuitwa zvichitevera mari yayakapihwa nebhanga reAfrican Development Bank kuitira kuti ivandudze mashandiro ayo kuburikidza nekutenga mishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti Zimra ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero inobhadharwa nevanhu nemakambani vanenge vachipinda nezvinhu kubva kune dzimwe nyika. Bhanga reAfrican Development Bank rakapa Zimra mamiriyoni masere emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti bazi iri risimbaradze mashandiro aro pakubhadharwa kwemitero. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati mari iyi ichabatsira kusimbaradza ZIMRA panyaya dzekutambira mitero pamwe nekurerutsira veruzhinji nemakambani kubhadhara mitero. Vachitaurawo pakasainiranwa chibvumirano chekubatsira Zimra nemamwe mapazi ehurumende, Commissioner General we Zimra, Amai Faith Mazani, vakati mari yavakawana iyi ichavabatsira zvikuru pakuvandudza michina yavo nemabasa avo pakubhadharisa mitero yakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

column2: America Inombomisa Vanhu Kupinda Munyika kweMazuva Makumi Matanhatu
column3: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vasaina gwaro rinombomisa vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica kwemazuva makumi matanhatu. Gwaro iri haribati avo vanemapepa ekugara munyika zviri pamutemo asi richarambidza avo vasati vave nemavhiza pari zvino kuti vapinde mu America. Vachinyora paTwitter pavo, VaTrump vati mutemo uyu wakaunzwa nechido chavo chekurwisana nemuvengi asingaonekwi, kureva Coronavirus, uye nechido chavo chekuchengetedza mabasa ezvizvarwa zveAmerica. Mutemo uyu haubati vanoshanda mune zvehutano kana vabereki vezvizvarwazveAmerica. Hazvisati zvave pachena kuti mutemo uyu uchabatsira papi uye kuti waitirwei sezvo vanhu varikuuya mu America vave vashoma pamusoro pechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachiita dzidzo dzepamusorosoro paHoward University, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti mutemo uyu hauna zvaunobatsira, vachiti VaTrump vanongoda kufadza vatsigiri vavo sezvo vakatarisana nesarudzo muna Mbudzi gore rino. No media source currently available

column2: America Yogadzirira Kutumira Vaongorori veSarudzo
column3: Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe unoti gadziriro dzeAmerica dzekuzongorora sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzave pachidanho chepamusorosoro. America inoti chikwata chayo chekutanga chatove muZimbabwe chakamirira chikwata chihombe chevaongorori vesarudzo vachazenge vari muZimbabwe vachiongorora sarudzo. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda muHarare, mumwe mushandi mukuru pamuzinda uyu, Amai Jennifer Savage, vati vanofara nezviri kuitwa mukuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo. Asi Amai Savage varamba kutaura pamusoro pekuti vemapato havasi kufara nebhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo vachiti vachazopa pfungwa dzavo kana richinge rapasa muparamende. Bhiri iri, iro rakapasa muNational Assembly svondo rapfuura, ratanga neChipiri kuzeiwa mudare reseneti. Amai Savage vati vari kunzwa zvakawanda pamusoro pesarudzo dzegore rino uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ichaita zvese zvairi kuvimbisa kuti sarudzo dzinge dzakachena. Amai Savage vati musangano wavo naVaMudenda wange wakanangana nekuvandudza kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. Vati America icharamba ichibatsira Zimbabwe mune zvakasiyana siyana uye pari zvino ichangobva mukupa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora pasi pechirongwa chemutungamiriri wenyika iyi chekurwisana neHIV/AIDS, chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo gore rino kekutanga vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro uye mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnanangagwa vari kuvimbisa sarudzo dzakajeka. VaMnangagwa vanotiwo vese vanoda kuongorora sarudzo idzi vakasununguka kuita izvi uye hurumende yavo yakatokoka nyika makumi mana neshanu nemasangano gumi nemashanu pasi rese kuti vazoongorore sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

column2: Vakaremara Votarisira Kuti VaNcube Vaise Mari yeKuvabatsira muBhajeti ra2022
column3: Vakaremara vari kukurudzira gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vari kuparura bhajeti rehurumende ra2022 nemusi weChina, kuti vawedzere mari dzekuvasimudzira sezvo vaomerwa nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachirwirawo kodzero dzevakaremara uye vasingaone, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pari zvino vakaremara vari kupihwa madhora zviuru zvitatu zvemunyika pamwedzi. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reUnited Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization, kana kuti UNESCO, yakaburitsa pachena kuti vakaremara ndivo vakanyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu munguva yeCovid-19 muZimbabwe sezvo vainge vokundikana kuzviitira mabasa emaoko kana kupemha. Vasikana vakaremara vanonzi vari kumbunyikidzwawo zvakanyanya munguva dzino dzekurwisa denda iri. Vakaremara vanonzi neongororo iyi vari kutadza kuenda kuchikoro kana kuzvipatara. VaKuchera vati zvakakosha kuti paiswe mari parutivi yekuti vakaremara vakwanise kurapwa nyore. No media source currently available

column2: Argentina Yomirira Morocco Kana France
column3: Mutambi ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Lionel Messi nezuro akatungamira nyika yake yeArgentina kurova Croatia 3-0 mumasemifainari emutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar. Argentina yamirira kuona kuti ichatama nenyika ipi pakati peMorocco neFrance idzo dziri kutamba nhasi, Chitatu. Messi akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga mushure mekunge nyika yake yapihwa penalty kwapera maminetsi makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe-39" mins. Zvimwe zvibodzwa zviviri zvakanwiswa naJulian Alvarez mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nemana-34" mins uye muchikamu chechipiri kwapera maminetsi makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe-69' mins. Nyika inenge yakuandwa ichatamba neCroatia pakuona kuti ndechipi chikwata chinotora chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakundano aya. Mutambo uyu uriko musi weMugovera nengubva dza5 manheru. Mutambo wekupedzisir weWorld cup uri kutambwa nemusi weSvondo nenguva dza5 manheru.

column2: Hurumende Yozeya Mutemo Unobharisa Mazana Mashanu Kune Vanoputira Fodya Paruzhinji
column3: Hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kudzika mutemo uchakonzera kuti vaputi vefodya vasabvumirwe kuputira paruzhinji hwakonzera mutauro kubva kune veruzhinji munyika. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuwunza bhiri kuparamende richange richisungira vaputi vefodya kuti vasaputire fodya pane veruzhinji. Pasi pebhiri iri, munhu anenge abatwa achiputa fodya paruzhinji achange achisungirwa kubhadhara mazana mashanu emadhora semari yefaindi kana kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu. Vaputi vefodya vakaita saVaFibion Munhuwa vanogara mumusha weEpworth vanoti havasi kuzofa vakaregedza kuputa fodya kunyangwe mutemo uyu ukadzikwa vachiti vanonzwa parere moyo kana vachinge vaputa fodya. Asi VaNigel Gwekwerere vanoti kuputira fodya paruzhinji kunokanganisa hutano hwevasingapute zvikurusei kuvana nemadzimai akazvitakura nokudaro vanoti vanotambira nemawoko maviri hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaMalvern Samhembere vanogara mumusha we Kuwadzana muno muHarare. VaSamhembere vanoti hapana chinovaka muviri chinowanikwa mufodya. Amai Gladys Runyowa vanogara mumusha we Greendale vanoti vanhu vasingapute fodya vazhinji vanobata zvirwere zvakanyanya kudarika vanhu vacho vanenge vachiputa fodya. Asi mugari wekubudiriro, VaClayton Ndlela vati zviri kutaurwa nehurumende hazvina musoro sezvo Zimbabwe iri imwe yedzimwe nyika dzinorima fodya yakawanda pasi rose. VaNdlela vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kutomborima fodya zvachose kana vasingade kuti fodya iputwe. Zvichakadai, VaAlbert Chidhakwa vanoti faindi iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa kana pakatariswa mari dzemihoro dziri kutambirwa nevanhu vazhinji munyika. Zvataurwa nava chidhakwa zvatsinhirwa naVaTichaona Murandu avo vanogara mumusha weHatcliffe muHarare. VaMurandu vanoti zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi kuita kwehurumende yapererwa irikuedza kutorera veruzhinji twumari twushoma twunenge twuri muhomwe dzavo. Vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vari munhu asingapute fodya, mari iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa zvikuru. Zvichakadai, muzvare Faith Musarurwa avo vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende ku muzarabani vakamirira MDC-T vanoti vari kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu asi hurumende inofanira kutanga yatara nzvimbo dzinobvumidzwa kuti vanoputa vaputire kwete kungodzika mutemo isati yaongorora zvinhu zvakadai. Makambani anogadzira fodya akatonyorawo pazvipepa zvinenge zvine fodya kuti fodya inogona kukanganisa hutano. Dzimwe nyika dzakawanda pasi rose kusanganisa america hadichabvumidze kuti fodya iputirwe pose-pose. Mukuru anowona nezvezvinodhaka mubazi rezvehutano, amai Dorcas Sithole vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kuedza kudzivirira veruzhinji kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvinokonzereswa nefodya vachiti vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvegomarara remumapapu. Amai Sithole vanotiwo bazi ravo rakamirira kupasiswa kwebhiri re national alcohol control policy kuti hurongwa uhwu hutange kushanda. Vanotiwo kudhakwa nekuputa zvakanyanyisa ichange iri mhosva pasi pemutemo uyu kana uchinge wapasiswa. Mutemo uyu uchange uchipawo huwandu hwedoro richabvumidzwa kutengeserwa munhu mumabhawa. Amai Sithole vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvakaringana nezvakatarwa nesangano re World Health Organization maererano nekuputwa kwefodya zvichitevera kusaina kwakaitwa ne Zimbabwe muna kurume wegore rino kuve nhengo yebazi re who rinowona nezvekuputwa kwefodya zvine mwero. WHO inoti vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu vanofa pagore nenyaya yezvirwere zvakanangana nekuputa fodya. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Coach wemaWarriors mutsva munaNdira’
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti richatanga kutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors munaNdira apo pachange papera kondirakiti yaJoey “Mafero” Antipas uyo akafanobata chigaro chekurairidza chikwata ichi.   Kondirakiti yaAntipas  — uyo anorairidza Chicken Inn zvakare — ichapera nemusi wa31 Zvita.   Antipas akagadzwa kuti afanobata chigaro chekurairidza maWarriors zvichitevera kusiya basa kwakaitwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa apo maWarriors aive achangobva kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare competitions manager — anoti Antipas ndiye ari kurairidza chikwata ichi kusvika gore rino rapera uye vachazozivisa kuti ndiani achatora chigaro ichi.   “Parizvino Joey Antipas ndiye ari panyanga uye kondirakiti yake yatinayo ichapera musi wa31 Zvita gore rino, kubva ipapo ndipo tichazozivisa nyika kuti tave kufamba sei,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti parizvino Zifa yambokurukura nevarairidzi vangani kana kuti vangani vakauya kwavari vachitsvaga basa rekurairidza maWarriors,  Gwesela anoti, “Sekutaura kwandaita, tichakuzivisai kana musi wa31 Zvita wadarika apo kondirakiti yedu naAntipas inenge yapera.”   Mwedzi unotevera maWarriors achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon uye Antipas ndiye ari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata ichi.

column2: Argentina Yosimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup keChitatu
column3: Argentina yasimudza mukombe weFIFA World Cup kechitatu munhoroondo yenyika iyi mushure mekurova France 4-2 mumapenalties kuQatar. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyu kekutanga muna 1978 pawakatambirwa munyika iyi ichi ichitungamirwa nakaputeni wayo Daniel Passarella. Yakarova Netherlands 3-1. Yakazosimudza mukombe uyu zvekare muna 1986 ichitungamirirwa naDiego Maradona. Argentina yakarova West Germany 3-2 kumakwikwi akatambirwa kuMexico. Mumutambo wanhasi wange uchinakidza zvikuru, France neArgentina dzaita mangange 3-3 dzisati dzaenda kumapenalties. Argentina ndiyo yatanga kutungamira 2-0 muchikamu chekutanga mushure mekunge Lionel Messi anwisa penalty papera mamaminitsi makumi matatu nerimwe, (31’ mins), Angel Di Maria akanwisa chechipiri mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nematanhatu, (36’mins).  Asi muchikamu chechipiri, Kylian Mbappe anwisa mushure memaminetsi makumi masere uye makumi masere nerimwe, (80’ ne 81’). Mutambo uyu wazoenda munguva yemuwedzeredzwa kana kuti extra time. Messi anwisa mushure memaminetsi zana nemasere (108’), Mbappe achizonwisa mushure nemaminetsi zana negumi nemasere (118’) . Nezvibodzwa zvitatu izvi, Mbappe ndiye anwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kudarika vamwe vatambi vose kuWorld Cip aine zvibodzwa zvisere achiteverwa naMessi ane zvinomwe. Mbappe apihwa mukombe wekurova mambure kakawanda kana kuti Golden Boot. Messi ndiye apihwa mukombe wekukunda vamwe vose kumakwikwi aya kana kuti Golden Ball.  Emiliano Martinez wekuArgentina ndiye akunda vamwe vabati vepagedhi vose kana kuti Golden Glove Award. Akunda vamwe vatambi vechidiki vose kana kuti Best youngster mutambi weArgentina zvekare Enzo Fernandez. Ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe.

column2: ‘Vatambi vePSL havaoni mambure’
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenhabvu ichitambira Black Rhinos – Maronga “Bomber” Nyangela – anoti vatambi vekumberi vezvikwata zvakasiyana vanozunza mambure havasi kunyatsobikwa izvo zvaona muPremier Soccer League muchishaya anonwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete sezvakapedzisira kuitwa mugore ra2010 naNorman Maroto achitambira Gunners FC.   Bomber, uyo vatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vanomuziva achizunza mambure zvakamuona achihwina mubairo weGolden Boot kanodarika katatu, anoti nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL inonwisa mvura asi dambudziko guru nderevatambi vekumberi vanokwanisa kunwisa kakawanda mumwaka mumwe chete.   “Nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL mwaka uno iri kunakidza uye varairidzi varipo vari kuziva zvavari kuita.   “Asi dambudziko rimwe chete nderevatambi vekumberi, havasi kunyatsozunza mambure. Vatambi vekumberi varipo vakatosiyana nevekare vataiona avo vainyatsozunza mambure zvaiita kuti nhabvu iwedzere kunakidza.   “Kuti chikwata chihwine mukombe wePSL, chinofanirwa kuve nemutambi wekumberi anonyatsozunza mambure sezvaiitwa nevatambi vakaita seni, Moses Chunga, Madinda Ndlovu nevamwe vakasiyana. Izvezvi tinoona Top Goal Scorer achipedza mwaka anwisa ka14 chete, hapana kwatinenge tichienda.   “Paye patinozotumira zvikwata zvedu kunze kwenyika, kana tisina vatambi vekumberi vanogona kunwisa, ndipo patinongosvika tichirohwa,” anodaro.   Nyangela anoti zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvemuPSL zvishande nevatambi vakaita mukurumbira vabatsire nekupa ruzivo kuvatambi vekumberi kuti vadzidze.   “Vatambi vakaita mukurumbira vakakosha saka zvikwata ngazvivashandise vapote vachivashevedza kuzoshanda nevatambi vachivadzidzisa zvidavado zvekunwisa izvo vaive nemukurumbira nazvo.   “Hatisi kuti toda kuuya mazuva ose, kwete. Tinopota tichiuya pano neapo kuzoshanda navo,” anodaro.   Pari zvino, Nyangela – uyo anogara kuMufakose muguta reHarare – anoti ari kusumudzira vechidiki vane tarenda renhabvu vachigadzira ramangwana ravo mumutambo uyu.   Tsvakurudzo yakaitwa neKwayedza svondo rino, inotaridza kuti mwaka uno parwendo rwekurwira mubairo weGolden Boot – kubva pamitambo 19 yePSL yatambwa – Brian Muza weChicken ndiye ari kutungamira pavatambi vanwisa kakawanda sezvo anwisa ka10.    Brian Muza   Muza anoteverwa naNyasha Tito Chintuli weManica Diamond naWilliam Manondo weCAPS United avo vese vakwanisa kunwisa kapfumbamwe pamumwe nemumwe wavo.   Vamwe vari murwendo rwekurwira mubairo uyu ndiJayden Barake weWhawha naThandolwenkosi Ngwenya weFC Platinum avo vanwisa kasere mumitamo yavatamba.   Clive Augusto, uyo aitambira Chicken Inn, ndiye akapedzisira kuhwinha mubairo weGolden Boot muna2019 apo akanwisa ka14 kubva mumitambo 17 iyo ainge atambira maGamecocks.   Augusto akazoenda kunotambira Maritzburg United yekuSouth Africa mwaka wePSL muno uchiri pakati.

column2: Kushaiswa Bhonasi Kokonzeresa Mutauro
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, neMuvhuro vakazivisa kuti hurumende haisi kuzobhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzebhonasi kwemakore maviri anotevera. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yaremerwa nezvinhu uye haichakwanisi kuti irambe ichimanikidza makambani kuti abhadhare mari dzemitero sezvo iwo ari kutatarikawo. VaChinamasa vanoti mugore ra 2014, hurumende yakabhadhara mabhonasi nemari inosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri emamiriyoni emadhora. Asi mapato anopikisa hurumende akaita seMDC-T, Nationalm Constitutional Assembly, pamwe nemasangano akaita seRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ari kushora zvikuru danho rehurumende iri achiti kuita izvi kuomesera mushandi. Hurumende iri kumbotiwo iri kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi kubva pavashandi vayo vanonzi vanosvika mazana mashanu ezviuru. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTskavafira Zhou, vanoti danho rehurumende iri rinoodza moyo. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti zvakaoma kuti hurumende irambwe ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mari nemitero yemakambani ari kunetsekawo. No media source currently available

column2: Dambudziko reMvura Rotyirwa Kuunza Zvirwere zveManyoka muShamva
column3: Mukuru wechikoro cheShamva Primary School, VaEdson Chuwe, vanoti vari kukumbira kuboka reZimbabwe National Water Authority, ZINWA, kuti rivhure mvura yarakavhara pachikoro chavo, iyo vanoti yakavharwa nekuda kwechikwereti chemari isina kubhadharwa. Chikoro cheShamva Primary School chinonzi chiri pasi pemugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, uyo uye chikwereti kuZINWA. Chikumbiro chaVaChuwe ichi chinotevera kurwara nemanyoka kwakaita vana vechikoro vatanhatu nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, kunyange hazvo chipatara cheShamva chakati manyoka aya haasi echirwere chekorera kana typhoid. Dambudziko remvura iri rinonzi rakabatawo zvakare musha weveruzhinji weShamva Gold Mine, izvo zvaita kuti vagari vedzimba dzemugodhi uyu vanyore gwaro kudare reparamende vachida kuti ripindire mukuona kuti ZINWA yavhura mvura yakavharwa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi wapera, sezvo iri kodzero yemunhu wese yekuti awane mvura yakachena. Vagari ava vanoti kuvharwa kwemvura kwave kuita kuti vanhu vashandise mvura inobva munzvimbo dzisina hutano, izvo zviri kuwedzera hurwere kwemanyoka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZINWA kanawo kubva kumugodhi weShamva Gold Mine. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende naVanaChiremba Voyambira Vanhu nezveMushonga waVaMagaya weHIV
column3: Bazi rezvehutano raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richikurudzira vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kuti varambe vachinwa mishonga yavo vachiongorora mashoko evamwe ekuti vakawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere ichi pamwe nechegomarara. Bazi iri harina haro kudoma nezita Muporofita Walter Magaya vekereke yePHD Ministries avo vakazivisa nezuro kuti vainge vawana mushonga yemiti inowanikwa muMozambique neIndia yekurapa zvirwere izvi. Bazi iri rati iro ndiro rinoongorora kukodzera kwekushandiswa kwemishonga kunyangwe yechivanhu pasi peMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Zvichakadaro, sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights-ZADHR- rinoti rapa VaMagaya mazuva matatu kuti vadzore mashoko avo ekuti vainge vawana mushonga unorapa chirwere chegomarara pamwe neAIDS. Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero iri rinoti VaMagaya vakatadza kuita izvi richavasungisa. VaMagaya vakaudza nhengo dzechechi yavo nezuro kuti vakawana mushonga uyu vachishanda nevamwe vavo vanobva kunyika yeIndia.\nVaMagaya vanoti zvakatora makore maviri etsvakiridzo kuti vawane mushonga uyu, uyo unogadzirwa kubva pamiti inowanikwa muno munyika nekunyika yeMozambique. Asi sangano reZADHR rinoti zviri kuita VaMagaya hazvina kunaka sezvo zvichigona kukonzera kuti vateveri vavo nevamwewo vanhu vazorega kunwa mishonga yavakapihwa navanachiremba votevera zviri kutaurwa naVaMagaya izvi. Mashoko aVaMagaya ashoropodzwawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika.\nVaBigboy Manatsa vanoti kuita kwaVaMagaya kuchauraisa vanhu vakawanda vanovatevera. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaElvis Karonga avo vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kuzozvirova dundundu kana mushonga wavo wagamuchirwa nebazi rezvehutano munyika. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTinashe Mhazi, vanoti VaMagaya varatidza kuti havasi vemweya sezvo vave kushandisa midzi yen’anga nekudaro havafanirwe kuteererwa. VaKaronga vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kushanda nebazi rezvehutano votora vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheAIDS vovarapa zvonyatsowonekwa kuti vapora vasati vazvipembedza. Asi mumwe mutendi VaRenius Rambanepasi vanoti vanhu vasakurumidze kusvora VaMagaya sezvo Mwari vachigona kushandisa munhu kuuya nemushonga wezvirwere zvisingarapike. Bazi reNational Aids Council, NAC, rabudisa chiziviso chekuti vose vari pachirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV varambe vachinwa mapiritsi avo sezvavakataurirwa kumakiriniki nekuzvipatara. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti hapasati pawanikwa mushonga wechirwere cheAIDS vachiti kana paine munhu anoti ave nemushonga wakadaro unofanirwa kuongororwa nanamazvikokota nekubvumidzwa nebazi rehurumende rezvehutano. Pari zvino vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nechidimbu munyika vari pasi pechirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa utachiwana. No media source currently available

column2: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
column3: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.

column2: Mamwe Makambani Ozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yaasina Kudya paNyaya yeKuburitswa kweMari Kunze kweNyika
column3: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekubudisa mazita evanhu nemakambani anonzi akabudisa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vachiti hurumende haina kuita tsvakiridzo yakakwana sezvo vamwe vane mazita akabudiswa vasina mhosva dzavakapara. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce neChina muHarare vamwe vemabhizimusi vachiti vakasvibiswa mazita avo zvakanyanya nehurumende izvo zvokanganisa mabhizimusi avo. Mukuru weGlobal Solar LED Bulbs, VaJeffree Rugare, vati vakatoshamiswa vachiona kambani yavo yakanyorwa pavanhu vanonzi vakabuditsa mari asi ivo vachizvichenura panyaya iyi. VaRugare vaudza musangano uyu kuti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti izvi zvakasvibisa kambani yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti hazvina chokwadi mukati. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChristopher Mugaga, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvabuda mumusangano wavaita zvisvike kumutungamiri wenyika kuti azive kuti vamwe vevari kupomerwa kubudisa mari zvisiri pamutemo vakachena panyaya idzi. VaMugaga vatiwo mabhizimusi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru achiti hurumende inenge iri kukoshesa mabhizimusi ekunze ichitsikirira vemabhizimusi emuZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe,vati hurumende yakaita zvayaifunga kuti ndozvingabatsira nyika. VaMukupe vati vose vari kuti vakachena vanofanirwa kutora matanho ekuratidza humbowo hwekuti havana mhosva. Vachipindura kunyaya iri kupomerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu vakabudisa mari zhinji huye vachizivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika havana kunyorwa mazita avo, VaMukupe vati vanhu vane ruzivo nezvevamwe vakabudisa mari ngavazivise hutungamiriri pamwe nemapurisa. Gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vatiwo mutemo yenyika haina kugadziriswa zvakakwana kuti ubate vanobudisa mari, uye vakurudzira kuti kunyatsonyorwa mutemo unobata vanobudisa mari. Vemabhizimusi vatiwo hapana tsananguro yakazara inoratidza kuti chinonzi externalization yemari chii huye chii chinonzi nehurumende “Illicit Financial Flows.” No media source currently available
